title: Stand-Bot
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Stand-Bot is a bot that helps you run stand-up meetings in Slack, and keep a record of your past stand-ups.
detailsTitle: A bot on your team’s side
detailsText: Be with a remote team can imply to work on a different time zone, and the stand-up meetings can be on a inadequate time, or in the stand-ups doesn’t keep a record of the session. Those are the main reasons we decided to build a bot that helps teams to organize better their meeting without any friction.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
